name: CreditCardTracker
0:
”Alexa, Open credit card tracker”
”Alexa, Ask credit card tracker to add a new card”
”Alexa, Ask credit card tracker to list my cards”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: credit card tracker
des:
Use this skill to keep track of all your credits cards and never miss a payment again. All you need to do is add your credit cards by specifying a name, billing cycle date and grace period. 

Once you setup your credit cards, you can ask Credit Card Tracker to tell you the due date of each card. You can check the due dates of all your cards by saying "list my cards", or check them individually by saying "check my card". You can also mark the credit card as paid by saying "mark my card as paid" so it won't show as due. 

Here are some sample questions you can ask :

Alexa, ask credit card tracker to add a new credit card.
Alexa, ask credit card tracker to list my cards.
Alexa, ask credit card tracker to check my Visa card.
Alexa, ask credit card tracker to mark my Visa card as paid.
Alexa, ask credit card tracker to delete my card.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
